def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: Combining age and BMI may provide better insight into health risk
    New Feature 1: age_bmi | age_bmi = (age * bmi)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np

    df_output = modify_features_v1(df_input)  # Start with the previous version to build upon

    # New feature:
    # Considering the number of children covered by insurance can also add to the cost estimation
    # Divide the total cost by the number of children to get cost per child
    df_output['cost_per_child'] = df_output['Result'] / (df_output['children'] + 1)

    return df_output
